# IKRig.Constraint.IKPositionDemand.Mode

**Enumeration**

Describes the acting modes of positional demands.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Mode
```

## Overview

See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKComponent/Constraint/animationOverrideWeight] for the actual target compute logic.

## Enumeration Cases

- **IKRig.Constraint.IKPositionDemand.Mode.poleVector**: A mode which pulls the joint in the direction of the set position target.
- **IKRig.Constraint.IKPositionDemand.Mode.reach**: A mode which uses the set position target.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
